attributes.action: My body My choice. Protest/work to go against the supreme court choices.
attributes.additional_details: These issues were fixed, the main problem of the USA was gun laws but now they are caging up their citizens to slowly feel unsafe and alone, making them feel like their emotions are wrong. When really everything they are doing is natural, but the Supreme Court are deciding to take control over everyone and making the USA worse. Trumps famous quote “make America great again?” America is getting worse, and it’s adding to the worlds issues. They could be focusing on worse problems but waste their time.
attributes.background: Work to go against the Supreme Court in USA to unban abortion, allow different race marriage and allow LGBTQ+ rights again. These are all being Galen away from many citizens in the USA and is corrupting the country. The suprem court are making more problems in the world that are unimportant.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619039
